name: Of Dice And Men
description:
Gather your army and destroy the enemy in this Turn-based Top Down Strategy game. Engage in JRPG-esque combat where entire units can be lost or destroyed in a single move. With each victory gain more units to deploy and overpower your foe with powerful unit combinations. Submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2022. Made by: Sharpshot124 Baconation Lagoonav 3rd Party Assets:  Opengameart.org:

Congus Bongus -  Cunning Plan

James Gargette - Six Minutes To Live

Unity Asset Store:

ETeeski - Level Texture Pack
